column1: Mallos was a flower that grew in the vales of Lebennin in Gondor
column2: described as having the shape and colour of a golden bell.

column1: Mallos is a Sindarin name meaning "golden flower"
column3: p. 100 apparently consisting of elements related to malt ("gold") + loth/loss ("flower"/"snow"). The Westron name of the flower is given as Goldenbell.
